26145056-fdfd-4f2d-909e-be84fc53ede8.Statement: Patients receiving the placebo intervention in the primary trial were twice as likely to experience emesis as patients receiving Aprepitant.
26145056-fdfd-4f2d-909e-be84fc53ede8.Label: Entailment

22384b11-eb42-42da-86b3-dfed559ebb77.Statement: Only 2 patients in the primary trial did not have Recurrence-free Survival
22384b11-eb42-42da-86b3-dfed559ebb77.Label: Entailment

b03bae0b-6811-4c4d-a265-98c0f4ae7f1f.Statement: patients who have received gabapentin or herceptin treatment in the past year are not eligible for the secondary clinical trial but can participate in the primary clinical trial
b03bae0b-6811-4c4d-a265-98c0f4ae7f1f.Label: Contradiction

1b2048ba-33c8-43d1-8d8f-bca70ca8d80c.Statement: the drug dosage for the primary clinical trial participants is lower in comparison to that of the secondary clinical trial participants.
1b2048ba-33c8-43d1-8d8f-bca70ca8d80c.Label: Entailment

f398c658-74cb-4d2b-894c-d785e4dde994.Statement: the primary clinical trial and secondary clinical trial utilize different metrics for assessing outcomes.
f398c658-74cb-4d2b-894c-d785e4dde994.Label: Entailment

d4b54b4a-d675-4d59-b489-2c1a025b2b4e.Statement: patients with a clinically speculated diagnosis of an inoperable non-small cell lung cancer or small cell lung cancer are eligible for the primary clinical trial
d4b54b4a-d675-4d59-b489-2c1a025b2b4e.Label: Contradiction

ad00f90a-b69d-4df4-a9f8-d495ac080b38.Statement: in comparison to patients on aprepitant in the primary clinical trial, those given the placebo intervention were two times more likely to undergo emesis.
ad00f90a-b69d-4df4-a9f8-d495ac080b38.Label: Entailment

7308389a-7cde-4cf2-8f68-cefff152645c.Statement: there were no occurrences of urinary tract infections among the participants of the primary clinical trial
7308389a-7cde-4cf2-8f68-cefff152645c.Label: Contradiction

d88cc7fc-34dc-4e86-a3a0-50192a316624.Statement: the secondary clinical trial allows the participation of patients diagnosed with malignant ductal carcinoma in situ and uncontrolled high blood pressure, whereas such patients are excluded from the primary clinical trial.
d88cc7fc-34dc-4e86-a3a0-50192a316624.Label: Contradiction

36eb6a9f-5a3a-4f8f-b242-e669aeaa3547.Statement: participation in the primary clinical trial is not allowed for patients with visible tumors in both breasts
36eb6a9f-5a3a-4f8f-b242-e669aeaa3547.Label: Entailment

b9e11a69-3cd1-4669-93ae-b644cbd40e71.Statement: the primary clinical trial accepts an unlimited number of patients with non-metastatic pancreatic cancer, disregarding presence of kras or braf mutations.
b9e11a69-3cd1-4669-93ae-b644cbd40e71.Label: Contradiction

57eb42a8-0c1b-4358-b024-0579811b3db3.Statement: interphalangeal joint 5 is a ginglymoid (hinge) synovial joint between the phalanges of the fifth digit of the hand or foot. the primary trial is testing the effects of different radiation therapies on its study groups, whereas the secondary trial is testing different doses of the same treatment on its study group.
57eb42a8-0c1b-4358-b024-0579811b3db3.Label: Contradiction

885733b0-a998-4f2c-b131-e58b2008a8a2.Statement: the primary clinical trial is designed for patients who exhibit optimal levels of vitamin d, but such patients may be disqualified from the secondary clinical trial.
885733b0-a998-4f2c-b131-e58b2008a8a2.Label: Contradiction

b8f0039d-f476-4aa1-a522-751d93e45147.Statement: results are available for the cohort on lbh589 and lapatinib in the primary clinical trial.
b8f0039d-f476-4aa1-a522-751d93e45147.Label: Contradiction

c6aa83b0-88fb-475a-8b38-e330d2bdf332.Statement: partial or complete response is a partial or complete response to treatment. the primary trial and the secondary trial adminster their interventions orally.
c6aa83b0-88fb-475a-8b38-e330d2bdf332.Label: Contradiction

b590614e-03b9-4e7b-91e9-940058316465.Statement: patients diagnosed with 2-3 cerebral metastases are ineligible for the secondary clinical trial, but they may qualify for the primary clinical trial.
b590614e-03b9-4e7b-91e9-940058316465.Label: Entailment

4a73eb98-e69d-4116-bbed-7e1b6458aa61.Statement: the primary trial requires patients to receive 0.12 grams of denosumab injected subcutaneously every month, the secondary trial does not require injection, instead using lymphoscintigraphy.
4a73eb98-e69d-4116-bbed-7e1b6458aa61.Label: Contradiction

eaf2bb85-799b-47e9-af79-4fc7a54f0fcd.Statement: the primary clinical trial administers a dosage of enzalutamide to cohort 2 that is double the corresponding dosage for cohort 1
eaf2bb85-799b-47e9-af79-4fc7a54f0fcd.Label: Entailment

1692ad17-057d-4d84-bc1b-f9fa773288b2.Statement: the procedure in the primary clinical trial's first cohort involves an intraosseous injection of fluciclatide, contrastingly, the first cohort in the secondary clinical trial is given an intravenous standard dose of chloroquine.
1692ad17-057d-4d84-bc1b-f9fa773288b2.Label: Contradiction

f3918549-5e15-44e3-b35b-f7f361845792.Statement: in the primary clinical trial, all observed adverse events were attributed to members of both cohorts, not exclusively those in cohort 1
f3918549-5e15-44e3-b35b-f7f361845792.Label: Contradiction
